A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.description:
Differentiate, compile, and transform Numpy code. JAX is a Python
library for accelerator-oriented array computation and program
transformation, designed for high-performance numerical computing and
large-scale machine learning.
dependent_to.name: py-jax

dependent_to.description: laplace - Laplace approximations for deep learning.
dependent_to.name: py-laplace-torch

dependent_to.description: A Python library for probabilistic modeling and inference.
dependent_to.name: py-pyro-ppl

dependent_to.description:
SfePy (https://sfepy.org/) is a software for solving systems of coupled
partial differential equations (PDEs) by the finite element method in
1D, 2D and 3D. It can be viewed both as black-box PDE solver, and as a
Python package which can be used for building custom applications.
dependent_to.name: py-sfepy

dependent_to.description: TensorFlow is an open source machine learning framework for everyone.
dependent_to.name: py-tensorflow

description: Optimized Einsum: A tensor contraction order optimizer.
name: py-opt-einsum
